title: Italic with a tailed ‹k›, book text
author: sanderpe

comments.content:
> you may try - Garamond font

What car is this?  
It’s the one with four wheels.

The font is [Granjon](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019065038/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/granjon/).
Thanks! I figured it was probably a Garamond-style, but didn't recognize the italic.
